quote: 2024 is going to be a terrible year for real estate until it's not.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges the optimistic view of the market and sets up a discussion on market dynamics.
suggested_hook: Is 2024 really the year to watch out for in real estate?

quote: Real estate in 2024 is not going to have an inventory problem. It's going to have a mortgage problem.
why_clipworthy: This shifts the focus from inventory to mortgage rates, offering a new perspective.
suggested_hook: Why the real problem in 2024 isn't inventory, but mortgages.
